__e: Now, on the one hand, you did help me escape from my prison.
The one you helped escape is a guest in my house.
It's been 10 months since you helped my whore of a wife run away from me.
Well, it is a lot quieter around my house since you helped him cross over.
You've helped me, God knows, in the past, and now I want to help you.
As my birth father what else can you do for me in this world you helped bring me into?
Dad always told me you were a great help to him in winning the war.
I feel bad, especially considering that you were so good to me... during the whole Big-married-man affair.
And he told me that you helped him a lot while I was gone.
So is Alicia, but you helped her on the death-penalty case.
You know that night when you helped me at the restaurant, I felt like I found a true friend we really bonded!
You helped me through the hardest time of my life.
You know, you got him through all that, and no one knows that better than he does, believe me.
She said that you helped her out with something said she was having some kind of a crisis.
What was the name of the girl you helped with this one?
